name: KINGGEAR Nordic Walking Stick, TP1 Hiking Poles Retractable Lightweight 7075 Aluminum, Trekking Poles with Flip Lock, Natural Cork and EVA Grip, 2pc Hiking Gear
short_description: 【Lighter Versatile Materials】 KINGGEAR collapsible trekking poles shaft is made of durable aviation grade 7075 Aluminum, lighter than typical 6061 Aluminum and stronger than carbon fiber, bearing more weight in rugged terrains.

【Secured Quick Adjustment】 KINGGEAR hiking poles are adjustable and retractable with our durable quick flip lock. Extended from 25.5 inches to 54 inches to suit the whole family. The right height of trekking poles helps to burn more calories while minimize critical impacts and injuries.

【Ergonomic Anti-Sweat Anti-Slip】 The natural cork grip is sweat wicking and conform to custom to your grip to reduce chafing. The bottom EVA effectively absorb sweat from your palm. The adjustable and breathable wristband further hinder poles slipping away from your hands.

【Comfort Traction Balance Accessories】A variety of different Hiking accessories for different trekking terrains are included to increase traction and maintain balance. The compressed Tungsten Carbide tip can be used for rocky and most demanding terrains, 2 snow basket for skiing activities, 2 mud basket for cross trailing events, 2 toughen rubber protective tips and 2 Nordic Walking boot tips.

【Trusted Choice of Hikers】Trusted by over 400,000+ obsessive hikers since 1999, you will feel 100% satisfaction from the moment you received our poles. With LIFETIME GUARANTEE and our customer service on Amazon welcome ANY QUESTIONS AT ANYTIME on our trekking poles!

name: 100% Carbon Fiber Trekking Poles by USA Brand - Ultra Strong Lightweight Collapsible Hiking Poles with Cork and EVA Foam Grips & Quick Adjustable Flip Locks
short_description: Built to Last: Made of 3k 100% Carbon Fiber, each pole weighs only 7.6 oz allowing you to keep your backpacking gear lightweight. Lighter & more versatile than aluminum, you’ll move quicker and exert less energy allowing you to walk longer distance.

Added Comfort: We use moisture-wicking ergonomic cork grips that conform to your hand shape for the ultimate fit! A nonslip EVA Foam Grip extension under the cork grip for quick use on steep climbs! And neoprene padded hand straps to avoid chafing.

Premium Stability: With our flip lock lever technology, our hiking poles are easy to adjust & lock in place securely. More secured locking than twist lock or foldable poles that slide out. And we use metal locks vs. plastic for ultimate strength.

Made For You: Our hiking sticks are retractable from 24” to 55” & are designed both short & tall Women, Men, & Kids! Built for backpacking, camping, & simple walks outside, our poles make the perfect camping essentials or outdoor gifts for someone!

Why Choose Us? Based in the USA & a team of Obsessive Hikers! Call us with Any Questions at Any Time. Trusted by 50,000+ customers since 2015 & a 3-year warranty to back up our products. Our first pole from 2015 is still going strong 7+ years later!

name: TheFitLife Nordic Walking Trekking Poles - 2 Sticks with Anti-Shock and Quick Lock System, Telescopic, Collapsible, Ultralight for Hiking, Camping, Mountaining, Backpacking, Walking, Trekking
short_description: Pack-and-Go: Extends to 51.2" (130 cm), collapses to 25.6" (65 cm), and disassembles to 21.46" (54.5 cm). When separated into three sections, they fit diagonally in most 22"+ suitcases. For air travelers, check your luggage’s interior length before ordering to meet airline baggage rules. For outdoor hikers, we recommend secure poles externally using backpack loops or straps

Lightweight but Strong, Only 9.92 oz (282 g) Each: Each pole weighs about the same as a 250 ml drink can, keeping your pack light while delivering dependable support. Built from high-strength aluminum alloy, it offers excellent impact resistance and fatigue durability. Adjustable from 25.6"(65 cm) to 51.2"(130 cm), it fits men, women, teens, and seniors. Available in five stylish colors, perfect for gifting

Quick & Smooth Twist-Lock Adjustment: Adjust your pole height in seconds with our refined glove-friendly twist-lock system. No bulky external levers, no snags, no fiddly parts - just a clean, streamlined design that tightens securely with a simple twist, even in cold weather or wearing gloves

All-Terrain Comfort and Stability: Enjoy a natural and secure hold with the non-slip ergonomic rubber grip. Includes a complete accessory kit: rubber tips, walking caps, mud baskets, and snow baskets, designed for all seasons and trail conditions. The built-in shock-absorbing spring that dampens trail impact, enhancing stability and comfort during use

Durable for Every Season and Every Trail: Built with rugged aluminum that withstands rough trails, rocky paths, cold weather, and daily use. A dependable companion for walking, hiking, trekking, fitness training, and backpacking trips, year after year

product_description: Simple, strong, reliable. The DynaLock Trail pole's 2-section aluminum construction makes it perfect for short snowshoe adventures past the trailhead or longer days exploring frozen valley basins. At its foundation is our DynaLock technology, which delivers a full range of length adjustability with fast, reliable locking. The DynaLock mechanism's unique design allows you to adjust its clamping force on the fly to ensure it's always tight and secure. Together, with an ergonomic grip and carbide steel tip, this pole is designed to back you up every step of the way.
